title: Home Team Prompt: Verify Home Team prompt displays

App is installed and has not been previously launched

Note:
-Does NOT matter if NHL user account is signed in (Home Team is saved locally)
custom_steps: 1. launch app for the 1st time - US Geolocation
custom_expected:
Welcome message seen and appears as expected - see attached current design (rogers version shown)
Confirm NHL.tv logo for US users, Rogers for Canada geolocation

title: Home Team Select: Verify Home Page Team Select displays
custom_preconds:
App is installed and has not been previously launched

Note:
-Does NOT matter if NHL user account is signed in (Home Team is saved locally)
custom_steps:
1. Launch app
2. "Select a Favorite Team" screen appears
3. Press [B] button on controller to select Close
custom_expected:
Home Team Select screen displays with:

- Select a Favorite Team (header)
- a navigable list of all NHL teams
- All NHL team logos appear correctly

title: Home Team: Verify Team Home page displays once selected (1st launch)
custom_preconds:
App is installed and has not been previously launched

Note:
-Does NOT matter if NHL user account is signed in (Home Team is saved locally)
custom_steps:
1. Launch app
- Home Team prompt message displays-
2. Close the prompt/message
- Home Team Select displays-
3. Select a Home Team
custom_expected:
Team Home Page displays.
Team logo and name display at top of screen, with a selection of the 3 most recent and/or upcoming games, mlb.com curated video clips, stats, and more... (TBD).

The Home Team is stored locally; it is not communicated back to nhl.com profile service (unlike Favorites).

title: Today Home: Verify Today Home displays if no Home Team is selected

App is installed and has not been previously launched

Note:
-Does NOT matter if NHL user account is signed in (Home Team is saved locally)

1. Launch app
2. The Home Team prompt launch message displays
3. Select NO Home Team
4. The prompt/message closes
custom_expected: Today/Home view displays.

title: Login: Verify Login message opens if not signed in with NHL account when attempting to launch VOD or Live video

-Xbox Live user account is signed in
-NHL.TV user account is NOT signed in

2. Select any Live or archived game tile

AND the user will be offered an option to Log In Now

title: Login: Verify Login message opens; when Selecting LOG IN button (in Settings)

- NHL.TV app is installed on the device
- Xbox Live user account is signed in
- NHL.TV user account is NOT signed in

2. Select LOG IN button

THEN we will be presented with a SIGN IN screen
AND an option for NHL.tv or Rogers GameCenter will be offered

title: Login: Verify Login success
custom_preconds:
NHL.TV app is installed
App has not been logged into with a NHL account

2. Navigate to 'Settings' and select 'Log In'
3. Choose NHL.tv option
4. Enter a valid NHL.TV account user and PW
custom_expected: User will be logged in and see an 'Account Activated' message

title: Login: Verify Login failed
custom_preconds:
NHL.TV app is installed
App has not been logged into with a NHL account

1. Launch the NHL.TV app.
2. Navigate to 'Settings' and select 'Log In'
3. Choose NHL.tv
3. Enter an invalid NHL.TV account & PW
custom_expected: User will NOT be logged into the app and an error message 'The account name or password is incorrect. Please verify login credentials and try again.' will be given

custom_expected: User will be able to navigate back to the Email and Password fields and enter credentials again

title: Login: Pressing the Back button from the Login Screen returns the user to the previous screen

NHL.TV app is installed

OPTION 1
1. Launch the NHL.TV app.
2. Navigate to 'Settings' and select 'Log In'
3. Press the back (B) button

OPTION 2
1. Launch the NHL.TV app.
2. Navigate to Live/VOD game and launch
3. Press the back (B) button
custom_expected:
THEN we will be returned to the previous screen.

option 1: Settings
option 2: Feed Select

title: All-Star Game/Break (Empty Days)
custom_preconds: It's the 2015-16 Season...if not, update the All-Star dates for this test.
custom_steps:
1. From Main Menu PU activate Calendar
2. Navigate to Jan. 27th
3. Activate Jan. 27th
4. Activate [ RB ] to nav through to Jan. 28th
5. Repeat step 4 until Feb. 2 is reached
6. Activate [ LB ] to nav to Feb. 1
7. Repeat step 6 until Jan. 27th is reached
custom_expected:
- Each day tested is accessible 
- All days show "There are no games scheduled for this date" text and No Games icon
- All-Star game appears as expected OR is not shown [confirm expected]

title: Verify Calendar opens to the current Month
custom_steps: 1. On Home, select Calendar button
custom_expected:
Screen updates to display the current month's game schedule, with:

- Today's date marked with "Today"

- Calendar View Option button ("all teams"/specific team)
- Month
- Arrow buttons (on either side of month) for navigating to previous/next month
- Days of the week
- Day tiles w/number of games scheduled per day

title: Verify arrow UI button navigates to previous and next months
custom_steps:
1. At Calendar note the current month displayed
2. Navigate and select the on screen buttons:

 - Left Arrow  
 - Right Arrow


Navigate back and forward though the months to the beginning/end of what is available.
custom_expected:
- Screen updates to correctly display all text, buttons and design elements of the previous month when Left arrow is selected.
- Screen updates to correctly display all text, buttons and design elements of the next month when Right arrow is selected.

custom_expected: Screen updates to display Team picker: navigable Grid of all teams and all team buttons are available and selectable

Screen updates to display the current month's game schedule, with Today's date marked.

Team Calendar displays:
- Calendar View Option button displays Team logo and name
- Month
- Arrow buttons (on either side of month) for navigating to previous/next month
- Days of the week
- Day tiles with scheduled game(s)- (if any)

2. Select any day beyond TODAY

custom_expected: Future tile is disabled

title: Verify Calendar allows navigation to previous season
Verify user is able to view Wild Card vs. Regular season standings - This test is applicable only for releases scheduled around Post Season

1.From Today (home screen) OR from context menu (controller: menu button)
2. Select Standings; observe Regular season standings
3. Activate [Y] to toggle to Wild Card Standings and observe
4. Activate [Y] to toggle to back to Regular Standings
custom_expected:
Step 2: User should see accurate Regular (current season) Standings.
Step 3: App should toggle to Wild Card Standings.

title: ***Logout: Verify choosing Logout options successfully logs the user out of their account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the NHL.tv app
AND we have successfully logged in with an NHL.com account
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the settings section
2. Select LOG OUT
3. Confirm logging out
custom_expected:
THEN we will be successfully logged out of our NHL.tv account
AND we will be returned to the Settings page
AND Logout button will update to say "Log In"
AND the logged out user's profile settings and entitlements will be cleared (and not be stored locally).

title: ***Logout:  Verify once logged out, previously accessible paid content can no longer be accessed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the NHL.tv app
AND we have successfully logged in with an NHL.com account
custom_steps:
WHEN navigate to Settings
and we select Log Out
custom_expected:
THEN we will be logged out of the NHL.tv account
AND we will be unable to further access any paid NHL.com content that we could previously access

title: ***Logout: Verify after selecting Log Out, user is given a confirmation prompt
custom_preconds:
NHL.TV app is installed
User has logged in with a NHL account
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the 'Settings'
2. Select 'Log Out'
custom_expected:
THEN we will receive a confirmation prompt
AND the message will have two options:
LOGOUT 
BACK

title: ***Logout: Verify choosing NO from the confirmation prompt, user is brought back to the My Account screen
custom_preconds:
NHL.TV app is installed
User has logged in with a NHL account
custom_steps:
1. Select 'Settings'
2. Select 'Log Out' > wait for the 'Confirmation' Prompt to appear
3. Select 'Back'
custom_expected:
THEN the Confirmation Prompt will dismiss
AND we will be brought back to Settings
AND we will still be logged into the NHL.com account

title: ***Logout: Verify choosing YES from the confirmation prompt, user is logged out of their session and brought to the cold start screen
custom_preconds:
NHL.TV app is installed
User has logged in with an NHL account
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to 'Settings'
2. Select the 'Log Out' option
3. Wait for the confirmation prompt
4. Select 'LOGOUT'
custom_expected:
THEN the Confirmation Prompt will dismiss
AND we will be logged out
AND we will be brought back to Settings
AND only Log In, Home Team and Home Screen Preference settings will be enabled.

title: ***Logout: Verify user's credentials are not maintained after logging out

NHL.TV app is installed
User has logged in with an NHL account
custom_steps:

2. Complete the 'Log Out' process
3. Navigate back to the login screen from Settings
custom_expected:
THEN our previously logged in credentials will not be populated in the Email/Password fields
AND we need to fill in our credentials again

title: Verify: Logging out as entitled user and logging in as free behave accordingly (unrestricted to restricted)

NHL.TV app is installed
User has logged in with an NHL account
The account has premium entitlement
custom_steps:

2. Select 'Log Out'
3. Login with an account that DOES NOT HAVE premium entitlements (free account)
custom_expected:
THEN the new user will be unable to view the previously unrestricted content
AND the content will be restricted accordingly

title: Verify: Logging out as free user and logging in as entitled behave accordingly (restricted to unrestricted)
custom_preconds:
NHL.TV app is installed
User has logged in with an NHL account
the account is not Premium entitled
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to 'Settings'
2. Select 'Log Out'
3. Login with an account that has Premium entitlement
custom_expected:
THEN the new user will be able to view the previously restricted content
AND the content will have no access right issues

custom_steps: 1. Access the NHL.tv from Xbox Home Screen

AND the user will be brought NHL.tv Home screen

there is an archived game

3. Select 'Resume'
custom_expected:

title: XR-03: Verify app acknowledges change in User entitlement when switching XBlive accounts during playback
refs: MLB.TV CU10 - Final 1 - MLBX5CCF99D4-  Certification Fai
custom_steps:
1. Sign into an Xbox profile linked to a publisher account.
2. Ensure that the console is set as the user’s Home console and launch the title.
3. From the main menu, select any full game and proceed into media playback by selecting a HOME or AWAY feed.
4. Press the Xbox button to constrain the title.
5. Access the Xbox Home account picker and sign out of the Xbox profile mentioned in step [1].
6. Sign back into the Xbox profile mentioned in step [1] and resume the title.
7. From the Sign In screen, select Sign In > the Xbox profile in use.
8. Observe that the title remains on the Sign In screen.
custom_expected: The title must allow the user to resume use of the title following a sign-in change.

title: ***Network: Verify bandwidth/stream quality adapts with network fluctuations
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed NHL.TV 
AND we have accessed the app
AND we are currently connected using a wireless ad hoc network
AND we begin playing a video
custom_steps:
WHEN we throttle the network connectivity (using Terminal Commands for our Ad Hoc Network)

> EX:
> sudo ipfw add 1 pipe 1 src-port 80
> sudo ipfw pipe 1 config bw 3000KByte/s
> sudo ipfw pipe 1 config bw 500KByte/s
> sudo ipfw pipe 1 config bw 75KByte/s
> sudo ipfw delete 1


or use network line conditioner
custom_expected:
THEN we will see the bitrate adapt
AND the video playback will adjust accordingly based on the connectivity of the wireless ad hoc network

title: ***Network: Verify video quality improves with connectivity improvement
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed NHL.TV 
AND we have accessed the app
AND we are connected to an Ad Hoc network
AND the connectivity has been throttled to a lower byte setting
custom_steps:
WHEN we begin playback
AND we slowly increase the available connectivity speeds
custom_expected: THEN the video quality will improve to a higher bitrate as the connectivity improves

title: ***Network: Verify when throttling connection strength that bitrate playback adjusts without issue in both directions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed NHL.TV 
AND we have accessed the app
AND we are currently connected using a wireless ad hoc network
AND we begin playing a video
custom_steps:
WHEN we throttle the network connectivity using Terminal Commands for our Ad Hoc Network to lower the connectivity speeds
AND we throttle the network connectivity to increase the connectivity speeds
custom_expected:
THEN we will see the quality of the video adjusts in both directions in correlation with the connectivity speed

Note:  XB1 has a cache of about 30 seconds of video, so if internet connection is downgraded, lost, restored, there is a 30 second delay between the update in status and the video playback reflecting the change.

title: Verify Player Controls function as expected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed NHL.TV 
AND we have accessed the app
custom_steps:
1. Launch a video feed
2. Tap 'A' on the controller

4. Attempt these displayed controls
custom_expected:

> A :Select
> d-pad controllerleft/right; nav l/r through UI
> controller LB/RB buttons; nav left right through prev/next milestone in timeline
> B : Exit Playback

custom_expected:

We have launched a stream

2. Launch a new stream
custom_expected: THEN the Closed Captioning setting will still be ON when we access the application again

title: CC: Verify user can toggle Closed Captioning "On"
custom_preconds:
We have installed NHL.TV 
We have accessed the app
custom_steps:
1. Access a video stream
2. Playback begins
custom_expected: THEN we can turn Closed Captioning ON

title: CC: Verify user can toggle Closed Captioning "Off"
custom_preconds:
1. NHL.tv is installed
2. Access the NHL.tv app
custom_steps:
1. Begin video playback
2. Turn on Closed Captioning
3. Turn OFF closed captioning
custom_expected: THEN Closed Captioning will stop appearing for the video feed

title: CC: Verify user Closed Caption status is properly reflected
custom_preconds:
We have installed NHL.TV 
We have accessed the app
AND have begun video playback
custom_steps: 1. Have Closed Captioning turned ON or Closed Captioning turned OFF
custom_expected: THEN the current CC status will be properly reflected in the on screen controls

title: CC: Verify System Closed Caption status is properly reflected
custom_preconds:
We have installed NHL.TV 
We have accessed the app
We have begun video playback
custom_steps: 1. Have Closed Captioning turned ON or Closed Captioning turned OFF in Xbox One System Settings
custom_expected: THEN the current CC status will be properly reflected on screen during video playback

title: Markers: Verify user selects a milestone marker that the user is properly brought to the appropriate location
custom_preconds:
We have installed NHL.TV 
We have accessed the app
We are watching video with milestones
custom_steps:
1. Navigate on the timeline to milestone marker
2. Attempt to play the milestone
custom_expected:
THEN playback will begin at the appropriate Milestone marker
AND it will be the appropriate milestone as described in the marker

title: Marker: Verify text and formatting is clear and readable for Milestone captions
custom_preconds:
We have installed NHL.TV 
We have accessed the app
We are watching video with milestones
custom_steps:
1. Navigate through milestone markers on the timeline
2. View the thumbnails and text
custom_expected:
THEN all text will be spelled correctly
AND all thumbnails will be formatted correctly
AND all text will be displayed without issue

title: Video: Verify incremental Rewind speed
custom_preconds:
We have installed NHL.TV 
We have accessed the app
custom_steps:
1. Enter a video stream
2. Attempt to Rewind 
3. Press REW control multiple times
custom_expected: THEN the REW speed should increment accordingly

title: Video: Verify incremental Fast Forward speed
custom_preconds:
We have installed NHL.TV 
We have accessed the app
custom_steps:
1. Enter a video stream
2. Attempt to Fast Forward
3. Press the FF control multiple times
custom_expected: THEN the FF speed should increment accordingly

title: AUDIO: Verify Audio Feeds
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed NHL.tv 
AND we have accessed the app
AND accessed a game with multiple audio feeds
custom_steps: When we select a French Feed
custom_expected: THEN the audio feed for the video should be FRENCH

title: GAMES: Verify Today's Games are displayed in correct order
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed NHL.tv 
AND we have accessed the app
AND we launch a video feed
AND we tap A controller button
AND the In-Player Navigation UI overlay the video playback
custom_steps:
1. Observe the Games UI
2. Scroll left and right through the game tiles
custom_expected:
THEN today's games will display (excluding for the game you are currently watching)

Default view-  
o Favorites teams first
o Games display in order of soonest start time 1st (live at front of list and Final games at end)

After you switch games, the last game you were watching is pushed to the beginning to the list in order to make toggling between two games quicker. 

Note: If you are watching an archived from a previous day, that game is NOT added to the beginning of the list.  The list will only ever contain today’s games.

title: GAMES: Verify Game Feed Select Status Updates
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed NHL.tv 
AND we have accessed the app
AND we access a Live Game Tile
custom_steps: WHEN we observe the Header Data
custom_expected: THEN the data will display game status in real time with updates to scores, PPs, EN, etc.

title: LINESCORE: Verify Linescore updates as game progresses
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed NHL.tv 
AND we have accessed the app
AND we are logged in to entitled account
AND Hide Scores is set to OFF
AND we launch a Live video feed
AND we tap A controller button to open In-Player Navigation UI
custom_steps: Navigate to Linescore option
custom_expected: THEN the current game's linescore will display.

User is logged out of PSN, Network Error Messaging seen in the Background
Return of LAN allows recovery - user returned to page Feed Select was opened from

PS4: 
Network Error Message seen -  Text TBD
Return of LAN allows recovery

title: Final Game > Highlights
custom_preconds: An NHL.TV free account (Not-paid user subscription)
custom_steps:
Log in
Navigate to a FINAL game
Select and launch any highlight
custom_expected:
Preroll ad plays
User is unable to trickplay or otherwise skip the preroll ad
Highlight clip starts after preroll ad completes

title: Any game > Feed Select > Recap

custom_steps:
Log in
Navigate to any archived game from a previous day
on the Feed Select screen, navigate to and launch RECAP
custom_expected:
Preroll ad plays
User is unable to trickplay or otherwise skip the preroll ad
Recap starts after preroll ad completes

Select any video feed and start playback

title: LIVE > Free Game of the Day

custom_steps:

Navigate to and select the Free Game of the Day (LIVE GAME)
Select any available video feed and start playback

*retest by selecting the below list from Feed Select popup
Watch Live
Start From Beginning
Resume
custom_expected:
Preroll ad plays
User is unable to trickplay or otherwise skip the preroll ad
Free Game of the Day starts after preroll ad completes

title: Trickplay: Verify only Pause/Play and Back (exit video playback) during (pre-roll/mid-roll) ad is allowed
custom_preconds:
Recap/Highlight player and Archived content will make a call for ads if response returns a valid response, the pre-roll ad is inserted automatically...and if the VAST manifest includes midrolls they would be inserted also.

Currently only pre-roll ads are expected.
custom_steps:
When pre/mid-roll ad is playing:
 attempt to Scan fwd  or Skip forward though the ad
custom_expected:
The user cannot FF through an ad, but can pause and back-navigate.

If the user rewinds past or to an ad that has already played once, the ad is skipped.  (If the user then leaves the player page and returns, the ad will be shown again)

title: Verify pre-roll only plays once per video launch; once the ad completes, user cannot scan back to it
Verify transition from ad to video playback is smooth (i.e. no waiting)
